column1: Comparison of narrow type with wide type in loop condition
column2: Comparisons between types of different widths in a loop condition can cause the loop to behave unexpectedly.
column4: Comparison between [["expression"|"relative:///src/test/java/org/apache/commons/io/testtools/FileBasedTestCase.java:87:25:87:25"]] of type int and [["expression"|"relative:///src/test/java/org/apache/commons/io/testtools/FileBasedTestCase.java:87:29:87:32"]] of wider type long.

column1: Local information disclosure in a temporary directory
column2: Writing information without explicit permissions to a shared temporary directory may disclose it to other users.
column4: Local information disclosure vulnerability from [["system temp directory"|"relative:///src/main/java/org/apache/commons/io/output/LockableFileWriter.java:178:23:178:58"]] due to use of file or directory readable by other local users.
